parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.80</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mission Information </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns date and time when mission started in format <tt>[year, month, day, hour, minute, second]</tt> in MP, which differs from [[date]] format only by seconds. In SP returns <tt>[0,0,0,0,0,0]</tt>.
<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Because this command returns the time of the actual start of the mission, it might not be available in ''pre-init'' or ''init'', but is guaranteed to be available in ''post-init'' when [[time]] > 0</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>Description</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[missionStart]] </value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[setDate]] ([[missionStart]] [[select]] [0,5]);</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Set real date: <code>//postInit = 1;
[[if]] ([[isServer]]) [[then]] {
	[[waitUntil]] {[[time]] > 0};
	[[setDate]] ([[missionStart]] [[select]] [0,5]);
};</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - real local date and time (similar to [[date]] format but with seconds)</value></part><part><name>Return value</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[date]], [[time]], [[daytime]], [[serverTime]], [[setDate]], [[systemTime]], [[systemTimeUTC]] </value></part><part><name>See also</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
